Introduction¶

Basics of the Model¶

Model with Perceived Risk

Assume mean-variance utility. Two returns are uncorrelated.

OK

begin{align}
E{r_D - r_F} & = gamma C{r_D - r_F,r_P} nonumber \ mu_D - mu_F & = gamma C{r_D - r_F,alpha r_D + (1-alpha) r_F} nonumber \ mu_D - mu_F & = gamma left[ alpha sigma^2_D - (1-alpha) sigma^2_F right] nonumber \ frac{1}{gamma}left[mu_D - mu_Fright] + sigma^2_F & = alpha left[ sigma^2_D + sigma^2_F right] nonumber \ alpha & = frac{tfrac{1}{gamma}left[mu_D - mu_Fright] + sigma^2_F}{sigma^2_D + sigma^2_F} nonumber \ alpha & = frac{tfrac{1}{gamma}left[bar r_{US}(1-tau_{US}) - bar r_{FOR}(1-tau_{FOR})right] + sigma^2_F}{sigma^2_D + sigma^2_F} nonumber \

end{align}
